analyzed: gang zhig khu byug bung ba sngon po lta bur 'jam gnag 'khyil cing mdzes pa'i dbu //

analyzed: gser gyi ri ngos tsam pa ka dang ldong ros lta bur dpral ba dri ma med //

analyzed: gangs dngul ku mu da dang @101b pad rtsa mu tig zla 'od las lhag mdzod spu dkar //

analyzed: gtso ma'i gser gyi kha dog lta bur 'phyang zhing rab tu mdzes pa'i snyan //
translated: Her ears, hanging down and very beautiful like the color of gold of JƒÅmb≈´ River,

original: aindra n'i la bung ba sprin gnag dang 'dra smin ma dri med 'jam //
analyzed: aindra n'i la bung ba sprin gnag dang 'dra smin ma dri med 'jam //
translated: Her eyebrows are smooth, dark like a black bee or a rain cloud,

original: shangs kyi gzangs mtho rab mdzes smin ma rgyas pa lta bur mkhur tshos dmar //
analyzed: shangs kyi gzangs mtho rab mdzes smin ma rgyas pa lta bur mkhur tshos dmar //

original: mchu ni bim pa gzhon bzhin 'gram pa seng ge dang 'dra kos ko'i dkyil 'khor mdzes //
analyzed: mchu ni bim pa gzhon bzhin 'gram pa seng ge dang 'dra kos ko'i dkyil 'khor mdzes //
translated: Her lips are like a fresh bimba fruit, her cheeks are like a lion, the circle of her cheeks is beautiful.

original: mnyam la thags bzangs tshems mnga' autpala rgyas pa'i 'dab ltar dkyus ring mnyen pa'i ljags //
analyzed: mnyam la thags bzangs tshems mnga' autpala rgyas pa'i 'dab ltar dkyus ring mnyen pa'i ljags //
translated: Her teeth are even, with good gaps, her tongue is long and soft like the petals of a blooming utpala flower,

original: ngang pa khu byug ka la ping+ka lta bur zab cing yid du 'ong ba'i ngag / lha rnga mtshog dang 'brug dang tshangs dbyangs lta bur snyan cing dri ma med pa'i gsung //
analyzed: ngang pa khu byug ka la ping+ka lta bur zab cing yid du 'ong ba'i ngag / lha rnga mtshog dang 'brug dang tshangs dbyangs lta bur snyan cing dri ma med pa'i gsung //
translated: Her voice is deep and pleasant like a goose, cuckoo, or kalavi·πÖka bird, like the sound of a divine drum, clouds, or BrahmƒÅ‚Äôs voice, with a pleasant and stainless sound,

original: zlum rgyas mgul ni dung 'dra yangs shing rgyas pa'i thal gang mtho //
analyzed: zlum rgyas mgul ni dung 'dra yangs shing rgyas pa'i thal gang mtho //
translated: Her neck is round and full like a conch, her broad and full shoulders are high,

original: gser sbyangs dang 'dra dri med gser gyi ri ngos mtshungs shing phrag gong dri ma med //
analyzed: gser sbyangs dang 'dra dri med gser gyi ri ngos mtshungs shing phrag gong dri ma med //
translated: his shoulders are stainless.üîΩHis hands are like the trunk of the god of gods, the color of refined gold,

original: sum cu rtsa gsum glang po'i sna 'dra btso ma'i gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i phyag / mdzes par 'khyil zhing bkra shis lcags kyu nya dang 'khor lo dag gis phyag mthil mtshan //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum glang po'i sna 'dra btso ma'i gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i phyag / mdzes par 'khyil zhing bkra shis lcags kyu nya dang 'khor lo dag gis phyag mthil mtshan //
translated: beautiful, coiled, and marked with auspicious wheels, hooks, and fish.

original: bung ba'i lus dang khu byug mdog 'dra ba spu re re nas g-yas legs par 'khyil //
analyzed: bung ba'i lus dang khu byug mdog 'dra ba spu re re nas g-yas legs par 'khyil //
translated: His body hairs are like the body of a bee or the color of a cuckoo, each hair perfectly coiled to the right.

original: gser gyi ri rtse pad+ma r'a ga myu gu 'thon pas khyab pa dang 'dra ba //
analyzed: gser gyi ri rtse pad+ma r'a ga myu gu 'thon pas khyab pa dang 'dra ba //
translated: Like a golden mountain peak covered with sprouts of rubies,

original: mchog gi rab mchog pad+ma r'a ga lta bu dbus nas lte ba g-yas phyogs 'khyil //
analyzed: mchog gi rab mchog pad+ma r'a ga lta bu dbus nas lte ba g-yas phyogs 'khyil //
translated: the supreme, excellent one has a navel like a ruby, coiled to the right in the middle.

original: mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs nub pus mo'i lta nga'i dkyil 'khor 'bar 'bur med cing mnyam //
analyzed: mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs nub pus mo'i lta nga'i dkyil 'khor 'bar 'bur med cing mnyam //
translated: His sex organ is concealed in a sheath, the circle of his knees is without bumps and even,

original: gser gyi chu shing 'dzam bu na de dang ni gser gyi ta la 'dra ba'i brla //
analyzed: gser gyi chu shing 'dzam bu na de dang ni gser gyi ta la 'dra ba'i brla //
translated: his thighs are like golden plantain trees, like golden palm trees.

original: legs skyes rim gyis pra zhing rab mdzes seng ge ri dags lta bur rje ngar zlum //
analyzed: legs skyes rim gyis pra zhing rab mdzes seng ge ri dags lta bur rje ngar zlum //
translated: Your feet are beautiful, with arches that are deep and lovely, like a lion‚Äôs or a deer‚Äôs.

original: ngang pa'i rgyal po dang 'dra mnyam la dra bas 'brel zhing rab tu mdzes pa'i zhabs //
analyzed: ngang pa'i rgyal po dang 'dra mnyam la dra bas 'brel zhing rab tu mdzes pa'i zhabs //
translated: Your feet are beautiful, with webbed toes, like the king of geese.

original: dal zhing brtan la mi g-yo seng ge dang ni glang po'i stabs 'dra mdzes par gshegs //
analyzed: dal zhing brtan la mi g-yo seng ge dang ni glang po'i stabs 'dra mdzes par gshegs //
translated: You walk beautifully, with the gait of a lion or an elephant, slow, steady, and unwavering.

original: ngos dmar mtshams kyi nyi ma dmar bas khyab pa lta bur 'od zer rnam par 'phro //
analyzed: ngos dmar mtshams kyi nyi ma dmar bas khyab pa lta bur 'od zer rnam par 'phro //
translated: Your body is radiant, like the sun shining on a red mountain peak.

original: gser dang nor bu chu shel lta bur mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba'i sku //
analyzed: gser dang nor bu chu shel lta bur mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba'i sku //
translated: Your body is beautiful and delightful, like gold, a gem, or the moon.

original: dri med nyi ma dbang po'i gzhu 'dra bcom ldan g-yas phyogs gshegs pa'i sku //
analyzed: dri med nyi ma dbang po'i gzhu 'dra bcom ldan g-yas phyogs gshegs pa'i sku //
translated: Your body, O Blessed One, is like the stainless sun or the lord of the stars.

original: rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i zhabs brtan yang dag brtson 'grus mdzes pa'i snam logs can //üîΩbcom @102a * //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i zhabs brtan yang dag brtson 'grus mdzes pa'i snam logs can // bcom @102a * //
translated: Your feet are firm, with the bases of miraculous powers, and beautiful with the back of the legs.

original: ldan seng ge mchod byas lha dbang klu dang mi yi dbang pos phyag byas zhabs //
analyzed: ldan seng ge mchod byas lha dbang klu dang mi yi dbang pos phyag byas zhabs //
translated: O Blessed One, your lion-like feet are worshipped by the lords of gods, nƒÅgas, and humans.

original: bdud kyi bu mos zur mig blta bas gang zhig mi g-yo ting 'dzin ri ltar brtan //
analyzed: bdud kyi bu mos zur mig blta bas gang zhig mi g-yo ting 'dzin ri ltar brtan //
translated: The daughters of Mara, with sidelong glances, cannot move him, for he is as firm as a mountain in his samadhi.

original: dpa' bo'i mtshon gyis mi bsnyil cod pan gyis gtugs dbang chen rnams la mgos phyag 'tshal ;
analyzed: dpa' bo'i mtshon gyis mi bsnyil cod pan gyis gtugs dbang chen rnams la mgos phyag 'tshal ;
translated: I bow my head to the great lords, whose crowns are not struck by the weapons of the heroes.

original: / de ltar bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis mngon par bstod pa bgyis pa las //
analyzed: / de ltar bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis mngon par bstod pa bgyis pa las //
translated: Thus I have praised the Lord.

original: bdag gis dge ba gang bsags des ni 'gro kun sangs rgyas myur 'grub shog //
analyzed: bdag gis dge ba gang bsags des ni 'gro kun sangs rgyas myur 'grub shog //
translated: By the merit I have gained thereby, may all beings quickly become Buddhas.

original: / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan la bstod pa snyan dang gas mkhan chen po slob dpon ma ti tsi tas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan la bstod pa snyan dang gas mkhan chen po slob dpon ma ti tsi tas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The praise of the names of the perfect Buddha, composed by the great scholar and master Mati-Citta, is completed.
